query.sql:
-- [params]
-- int :months_ago = 1

WITH query_period AS (
SELECT
date_trunc('month', CURRENT_DATE) - INTERVAL ':months_ago months' as period_start,
date_trunc('month', CURRENT_DATE) - INTERVAL ':months_ago months' + INTERVAL '1 month' - INTERVAL '1 second' as period_end
)

SELECT
ua.user_id,
count(1) AS solved_count
FROM user_actions ua
INNER JOIN query_period qp
ON ua.created_at >= qp.period_start
AND ua.created_at <= qp.period_end
INNER JOIN users u
ON u.id = ua.user_id
WHERE ua.action_type = 15
AND (u.primary_group_id = 43)
GROUP BY ua.user_id
ORDER BY solved_count DESC
query.name: Solved count by Netdata Team (monthly)
query.description:
Count of topics solved by staff(defaults to last month).
Use months_ago = 0 for current month
Netdata team group is id=43
